title: Authors and Citation
text: Felix Luginbuhl. Author, maintainer, copyright holder. Janosch Brenzel-Weiss. Contributor. Joao Martins. Contributor. Philipp Baumann. Contributor.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Luginbuhl F (2024). BFS: Get Data Swiss Federal Statistical Office. R package version 0.5.10, https://github.com/lgnbhl/BFS/, https://felixluginbuhl.com/BFS/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {BFS: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office},   author = {Felix Luginbuhl},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.5.10, https://github.com/lgnbhl/BFS/},   url = {https://felixluginbuhl.com/BFS/}, }

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement [INSERT CONTACT METHOD]. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/ code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https:// www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

what: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: Search download data Swiss Federal Statistical Office BFS package allows search download public data Swiss Federal Statistical Office (BFS stands Bundesamt für Statistik German) APIs dynamic reproducible way.

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: can also install development version Github.
code: install.packages("BFS") devtools::install_github("lgnbhl/BFS")

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
code: library(BFS)

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: Retrieve list publicly available datasets data catalog (equivalent selecting “data” “Article Type” dropdown BFS website) language (“de”, “fr”, “” “en”) calling bfs_get_catalog_data(). can search data catalog using following arguments: language: language BFS catalog, .e. “de”, “fr”, “” “en”. title: search title, subtitle supertitle. extended_search: extended search (sub/super)title, orderNr, summary, shortSummary, shortTextGNP. spatial_division: choose “Switzerland”, “Cantons”, “Districts”, “Communes”, “spatial divisions” “International”. prodima: specific BFS themes using unique prodima number. inquiry: inquiry number. institution: institution. publishing_year_start: publishing year start. publishing_year_end: publishing year end. order_nr: BFS Number (FSO number). example, can search data related students using extended search: Note BFS number (FSO number) available column order_nr. English (“en”) Italian (“”) data catalogs offer limited list datasets. full list please get French (“fr”) German (“de”) data catalogs (see language_available column).
code: bfs_get_catalog_data(language = "en") ## # A tibble: 202 × 9 ##    title                  language number_asset publication_date order_nr url_px ##    <chr>                  <chr>    <chr>        <date>           <chr>    <chr>  ##  1 Air emissions account… en       32331273     2024-09-26       px-x-02… https… ##  2 Deaths per month and … en       32506839     2024-09-26       px-x-01… https… ##  3 Divorces and divortia… en       32506841     2024-09-26       px-x-01… https… ##  4 Energy accounts of ec… en       32331272     2024-09-26       px-x-02… https… ##  5 Live births per month… en       32506840     2024-09-26       px-x-01… https… ##  6 Marriages and nuptial… en       32506838     2024-09-26       px-x-01… https… ##  7 New registrations of … en       32466294     2024-09-16       px-x-11… https… ##  8 Hotel sector: arrival… en       32427368     2024-09-05       px-x-10… https… ##  9 Hotel sector: arrival… en       32427369     2024-09-05       px-x-10… https… ## 10 Hotel sector: arrival… en       32427370     2024-09-05       px-x-10… https… ## # ℹ 192 more rows ## # ℹ 3 more variables: language_available <list>, url_structure_json <chr>, ## #   damId <int> catalog_student <- bfs_get_catalog_data(language = "en", extended_search = "student")  catalog_student ## # A tibble: 4 × 9 ##   title                   language number_asset publication_date order_nr url_px ##   <chr>                   <chr>    <chr>        <date>           <chr>    <chr>  ## 1 University of applied … en       31306033     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… ## 2 University of applied … en       31306029     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… ## 3 University students by… en       31305852     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… ## 4 University students by… en       31305854     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… ## # ℹ 3 more variables: language_available <list>, url_structure_json <chr>, ## #   damId <int>

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: function bfs_get_data() allows download dataset BFS catalog (equivalent selecting “data” “Article Type” dropdown BFS website) using BFS number (FSO number). Using number_bfs argument (FSO number), can get BFS data given language (“en”, “de”, “fr” “”) official PXWeb API Swiss Federal Statistical Office.
code: #catalog_student$order_nr[1] # px-x-1502040100_131  bfs_get_data(number_bfs = "px-x-1502040100_131", language = "en") ## # A tibble: 18,480 × 5 ##    Year    `ISCED Field`     Sex    `Level of study`       `University students` ##    <chr>   <chr>             <chr>  <chr>                                  <dbl> ##  1 1980/81 Education science Male   First university degr…                   545 ##  2 1980/81 Education science Male   Bachelor                                   0 ##  3 1980/81 Education science Male   Master                                     0 ##  4 1980/81 Education science Male   Doctorate                                 93 ##  5 1980/81 Education science Male   Further education, ad…                    13 ##  6 1980/81 Education science Female First university degr…                   946 ##  7 1980/81 Education science Female Bachelor                                   0 ##  8 1980/81 Education science Female Master                                     0 ##  9 1980/81 Education science Female Doctorate                                 70 ## 10 1980/81 Education science Female Further education, ad…                    52 ## # ℹ 18,470 more rows

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: running bfs_get_data() function may get following error message (issue #7). happen ran many times bfs_get_*() function (API config ). solution wait seconds running next bfs_get_*() function. can add delay R code using delay argument. error message remains, querying large BFS dataset. Two workarounds exist: ) download BFS file using bfs_download_asset() read locally b) query specific elements data reduce API call (see next section). example using bfs_download_asset() function: Note reading PX file using pxR::read.px() gives access German version.
code: Error in pxweb_advanced_get(url = url, query = query, verbose = verbose) :    Too Many Requests (RFC 6585) (HTTP 429). bfs_get_data(   number_bfs = "px-x-1502040100_131",    language = "en",    delay = 10 ) BFS::bfs_download_asset(   number_bfs = "px-x-1502040100_131", #number_asset also possible   destfile = "px-x-1502040100_131.px" )  library(pxR) # install.packages("pxR") large_dataset <- pxR::read.px(filename = "px-x-1502040100_131.px") |>   as.data.frame()

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: First want get metadata dataset, .e. variables (code text) dimensions (values valueTexts). example: can filter dimensions want query using text valueTexts variables build query dimension object code values variables. Finally can query BFS data specific dimensions.
code: metadata <- bfs_get_metadata(number_bfs = "px-x-1502040100_131", language = "en")  # tidy metadata library(dplyr) library(tidyr) # for unnest_longer  metadata_tidy <- metadata |>   unnest_longer(c(values, valueTexts))  metadata_tidy ## # A tibble: 92 × 7 ##    code  text  values valueTexts time  elimination ##    <chr> <chr> <chr>  <chr>      <lgl> <lgl>       ##  1 Jahr  Year  0      1980/81    TRUE  NA          ##  2 Jahr  Year  1      1981/82    TRUE  NA          ##  3 Jahr  Year  2      1982/83    TRUE  NA          ##  4 Jahr  Year  3      1983/84    TRUE  NA          ##  5 Jahr  Year  4      1984/85    TRUE  NA          ##  6 Jahr  Year  5      1985/86    TRUE  NA          ##  7 Jahr  Year  6      1986/87    TRUE  NA          ##  8 Jahr  Year  7      1987/88    TRUE  NA          ##  9 Jahr  Year  8      1988/89    TRUE  NA          ## 10 Jahr  Year  9      1989/90    TRUE  NA          ## # ℹ 82 more rows ## # ℹ 1 more variable: title <chr> # select dimensions dim1 <- metadata_tidy |>   filter(text == "Year" & valueTexts %in% c("2020/21", "2021/22")) dim2 <- metadata_tidy |>   filter(text == "Level of study" & valueTexts %in% c("Master", "Doctorate")) dim3 <- metadata_tidy |>   filter(text == "ISCED Field" & valueTexts %in% c("Education science")) dim4 <- metadata_tidy |>   filter(text == "Sex") # all valueTexts dimensions  # build dimensions list object dimensions <- list(   dim1$values,   dim2$values,   dim3$values,   dim4$values )  names(dimensions) <- c(   unique(dim1$code),    unique(dim2$code),    unique(dim3$code),    unique(dim4$code) )  dimensions ## $Jahr ## [1] "40" "41" ##  ## $Studienstufe ## [1] "2" "3" ##  ## $`ISCED Fach` ## [1] "0" ##  ## $Geschlecht ## [1] "0" "1" BFS::bfs_get_data(   number_bfs = "px-x-1502040100_131",   language = "en",   query = dimensions   ) ## # A tibble: 8 × 5 ##   Year    `ISCED Field`     Sex    `Level of study` `University students` ##   <chr>   <chr>             <chr>  <chr>                            <dbl> ## 1 2020/21 Education science Male   Master                             151 ## 2 2020/21 Education science Male   Doctorate                          121 ## 3 2020/21 Education science Female Master                             555 ## 4 2020/21 Education science Female Doctorate                          306 ## 5 2021/22 Education science Male   Master                             143 ## 6 2021/22 Education science Male   Doctorate                          115 ## 7 2021/22 Education science Female Master                             599 ## 8 2021/22 Education science Female Doctorate                          318

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: lot datasets accessible official PXWeb API. listed data catalog “tables” “Article Type” dropdown BFS website. can search specific tables using bfs_get_catalog_tables(). BFS tables Excel CSV files. can download table bfs_download_asset() using number asset.
code: catalog_tables_en_students <- bfs_get_catalog_tables(language = "en", extended_search = "students")  catalog_tables_en_students ## # A tibble: 5 × 7 ##   title       language number_asset publication_date order_nr language_available ##   <chr>       <chr>    <chr>        <date>           <chr>    <list>             ## 1 Students a… en       31826381     2024-05-01       ts-x-15… <chr [4]>          ## 2 Students a… en       31826380     2024-05-01       ts-x-15… <chr [4]>          ## 3 Students a… en       31185431     2024-03-28       su-e-15… <chr [1]>          ## 4 Students a… en       31185438     2024-03-28       su-e-15… <chr [1]>          ## 5 Students a… en       31185427     2024-03-28       su-e-15… <chr [1]>          ## # ℹ 1 more variable: damId <int> library(dplyr)  tables_asset_number_students <- catalog_tables_en_students |>   dplyr::filter(title == "Students at universities and institutes of technology: Basistables") |>   dplyr::pull(number_asset)  file_path <- BFS::bfs_download_asset(   number_asset = tables_asset_number_students,   destfile = "su-e-15.02.04.01.xlsx" )

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: Display geo-information catalog Swiss Official STAC API using bfs_get_catalog_geodata().
code: catalog_geodata <- bfs_get_catalog_geodata(include_metadata = TRUE)  catalog_geodata ## # A tibble: 281 × 12 ##    collection_id     type  href  title description created updated crs   license ##    <chr>             <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>       <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>   ##  1 ch.are.agglomera… API   http… Citi… "The list … 2021-1… 2023-0… http… propri… ##  2 ch.are.alpenkonv… API   http… Alpi… "The perim… 2021-1… 2022-0… http… propri… ##  3 ch.are.belastung… API   http… Load… "Passenger… 2021-1… 2022-0… http… propri… ##  4 ch.are.belastung… API   http… Load… "Passenger… 2021-1… 2022-0… http… propri… ##  5 ch.are.belastung… API   http… Load… "Vehicles … 2021-1… 2022-0… http… propri… ##  6 ch.are.belastung… API   http… Load… "Vehicles … 2021-1… 2022-0… http… propri… ##  7 ch.are.erreichba… API   http… Acce… "Accessibi… 2021-1… 2022-0… http… propri… ##  8 ch.are.erreichba… API   http… Acce… "Accessibi… 2021-1… 2022-0… http… propri… ##  9 ch.are.gemeindet… API   http… Typo… "The typol… 2021-1… 2022-0… http… propri… ## 10 ch.are.gueteklas… API   http… Publ… "The publi… 2021-1… 2023-0… http… propri… ## # ℹ 271 more rows ## # ℹ 3 more variables: provider_name <chr>, bbox <list>, inverval <list>

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: example can get information dataset “Generalised borders G1 area urban character”. Download dataset collection id bfs_download_geodata() unzip file needed. default, files downloaded temporary directory. can specify folder saving files using output_dir argument. layers accessible using WMS (Web Map Service):
code: library(dplyr)  geodata_g1 <- catalog_geodata |>   filter(title == "Generalised borders G1 and area with urban character")    geodata_g1 ## # A tibble: 1 × 12 ##   collection_id      type  href  title description created updated crs   license ##   <chr>              <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>       <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>   ## 1 ch.bfs.generalisi… API   http… Gene… Administra… 2022-0… 2023-0… http… propri… ## # ℹ 3 more variables: provider_name <chr>, bbox <list>, inverval <list> # Access Generalised borders G1 and area with urban character borders_g1_path <- bfs_download_geodata(   collection_id = "ch.bfs.generalisierte-grenzen_agglomerationen_g1",    output_dir = tempdir() #  temporary directory )  # you may need to unzip the file unzip(borders_g1_path[4], exdir = "borders_G1") library(leaflet)  leaflet() %>%    setView(lng = 8, lat = 46.8, zoom = 8) %>%   addWMSTiles(     baseUrl = "https://wms.geo.admin.ch/?",      layers = "ch.bfs.generalisierte-grenzen_agglomerationen_g2",     options = WMSTileOptions(format = "image/png", transparent = TRUE),     attribution = "Generalised borders G1 © 2024 BFS")

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: can get cartographic base maps ThemaKart project using bfs_get_base_maps(). list available geometries official documentation. default arguments bfs_get_base_maps() can change access specific files: typical base maps ThemaKart file looks like :   can create interactive map easily mapview R package.
code: # default arguments bfs_get_base_maps(   geom = NULL,   category = "gf", # "gf" for total area (i.e. "Gesamtflaeche")   type = "Poly",   date = NULL,   most_recent = TRUE, #get most recent file by default   format = "shp",   asset_number = "24025646" #change to get older ThemaKart data ) # list of geometry names: https://www.bfs.admin.ch/asset/en/24025645 switzerland_sf <- bfs_get_base_maps(geom = "suis") communes_sf <- bfs_get_base_maps(geom = "polg", date = "20230101") districts_sf <- bfs_get_base_maps(geom = "bezk") cantons_sf <- bfs_get_base_maps(geom = "kant") cantons_capitals_sf <- bfs_get_base_maps(geom = "stkt", type = "Pnts", category = "kk") lakes_sf <- bfs_get_base_maps(geom = "seen", category = "11")  library(ggplot2)  ggplot() +    geom_sf(data = communes_sf, fill = "snow", color = "grey45") +    geom_sf(data = lakes_sf, fill = "lightblue2", color = "black") +   geom_sf(data = districts_sf, fill = "transparent", color = "grey65") +    geom_sf(data = cantons_sf, fill = "transparent", color = "black") +   geom_sf(data = cantons_capitals_sf, shape = 18, size = 3) +   theme_minimal() +   theme(axis.text = element_blank()) +   labs(caption = "Source: ThemaKart, © BFS") library(mapview)  BFS::bfs_get_base_maps(geom = "bezk") |>   mapview(zcol = "name", legend = FALSE)

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: package also contains official Swiss official commune registers different administrative levels: register_gde register_gde_other register_bzn register_kt register_kt_seeanteile register_dic can use registers ease geodata analysis.
code: # commune register data BFS::register_gde ## # A tibble: 2,136 × 8 ##    GDEKT GDEBZNR GDENR GDENAME            GDENAMK      GDEBZNA GDEKTNA GDEMUTDAT ##    <chr>   <dbl> <dbl> <chr>              <chr>        <chr>   <chr>   <chr>     ##  1 ZH        101     1 Aeugst am Albis    Aeugst am A… Bezirk… Zürich  1976-11-… ##  2 ZH        101     2 Affoltern am Albis Affoltern a… Bezirk… Zürich  1848-09-… ##  3 ZH        101     3 Bonstetten         Bonstetten   Bezirk… Zürich  1848-09-… ##  4 ZH        101     4 Hausen am Albis    Hausen am A… Bezirk… Zürich  1911-01-… ##  5 ZH        101     5 Hedingen           Hedingen     Bezirk… Zürich  1848-09-… ##  6 ZH        101     6 Kappel am Albis    Kappel am A… Bezirk… Zürich  1911-01-… ##  7 ZH        101     7 Knonau             Knonau       Bezirk… Zürich  1848-09-… ##  8 ZH        101     8 Maschwanden        Maschwanden  Bezirk… Zürich  1848-09-… ##  9 ZH        101     9 Mettmenstetten     Mettmenstet… Bezirk… Zürich  1848-09-… ## 10 ZH        101    10 Obfelden           Obfelden     Bezirk… Zürich  1848-09-… ## # ℹ 2,126 more rows library(dplyr) library(sf)  communes_sf <- bfs_get_base_maps(geom = "polg", date = "20230101")  communes_ge <- communes_sf |>   inner_join(BFS::register_gde |>                 filter(GDEKTNA == "Genève"),               by = c("id" = "GDENR"))  bbox_ge <- sf::st_bbox(communes_ge)  lake_leman <- bfs_get_base_maps(geom = "seen", category = "11") |>   filter(name == "Lac Léman")  communes_ge |>    ggplot() +    geom_sf(data = lake_leman, fill = "lightblue2", color = "grey65") +   geom_sf(fill = "snow", color = "grey65") +    geom_sf_text(aes(label = name), size = 3, check_overlap = T) +    # bounding box   coord_sf(     xlim = c(bbox_ge$xmin, bbox_ge$xmax),     ylim = c(bbox_ge$ymin, bbox_ge$ymax)   ) +   theme_minimal() +   theme(axis.text = element_blank()) +   labs(title = "Communes du canton de Genève",        x = NULL, y = NULL,         caption = "Source: ThemaKart, © BFS")

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: hood, package using pxweb package query Swiss Federal Statistical Office PXWEB API. PXWEB API structure developed Statistics Sweden national statistical institutions (NSI) disseminate public statistics structured way. query Geo Admin STAC API, package using rstac package. STAC specification files web services used describe geospatial information assets. can clean column names datasets automatically using janitor::clean_names() adding argument clean_names = TRUE bfs_get_data() function.

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: package way officially related endorsed Swiss Federal Statistical Office (BFS).

title: Get Data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office
text: contribution strongly appreciated. Feel free report bug, ask question make pull request remaining issue.

what: Download a BFS asset file — bfs_download_asset
title: Download a BFS asset file — bfs_download_asset
text: function uses DAM API https://dam-api.bfs.admin.ch/hub/swagger-ui/index.html download BFS file asset number BFS number. file downloaded using `curl::curl_download()` hood.

title: Download a BFS asset file — bfs_download_asset
code: bfs_download_asset(   number_asset = NULL,   number_bfs = NULL,   destfile,   quiet = TRUE,   mode = "wb",   handle = curl::new_handle() )

title: Download a BFS asset file — bfs_download_asset
text: number_asset asset number dataset number_bfs BFS number dataset. destfile character string name downloaded file saved. Tilde-expansion performed. quiet TRUE, suppress status messages (), progress bar. mode character string specifying mode write file. Useful values "w", "wb" (binary), "" (append) "ab". handle curl handle object

title: Download a BFS asset file — bfs_download_asset
text: Returns file path file downloaded. Returns NULL connection.

what: Download a geographic file from the Swiss geo-portal — bfs_download_geodata
title: Download a geographic file from the Swiss geo-portal — bfs_download_geodata
text: Download assets STAC API geodata catalog Swiss Confederation (https://data.geo.admin.ch/api/stac/v0.9/).

title: Download a geographic file from the Swiss geo-portal — bfs_download_geodata
code: bfs_download_geodata(   collection_id = collection_id,   output_dir = tempdir(),   overwrite = FALSE,   create_json = FALSE,   bbox = NULL,   asset_names = NULL,   datetime = NULL,   feature_id = NULL )

title: Download a geographic file from the Swiss geo-portal — bfs_download_geodata
text: collection_id collection_id output_dir output_dir overwrite overwrite create_json create_json bbox bbox asset_names asset_names datetime datetime feature_id feature_id

title: Download a geographic file from the Swiss geo-portal — bfs_download_geodata
text: Returns file path file downloaded. Returns NULL connection.

title: Download a geographic file from the Swiss geo-portal — bfs_download_geodata
text: use data services free subject provisions fair use (see https://www.geo.admin.ch/terms--use).

what: Get asset metadata in a given language — bfs_get_asset_metadata
title: Get asset metadata in a given language — bfs_get_asset_metadata
text: function uses DAM API https://dam-api.bfs.admin.ch/hub/swagger-ui/index.html get metadata BFS file asset number BFS number given language.

title: Get asset metadata in a given language — bfs_get_asset_metadata
code: bfs_get_asset_metadata(   number_asset = NULL,   number_bfs = NULL,   language = c("de", "fr", "it", "en") )

title: Get asset metadata in a given language — bfs_get_asset_metadata
text: number_asset asset number dataset number_bfs BFS number dataset. language character language BFS catalog, .e. "de", "fr", "" "en".

title: Get asset metadata in a given language — bfs_get_asset_metadata
text: list Returns list containing asset metadata information. Returns NULL connection.

what: Get Switzerland base maps data — bfs_get_base_maps
title: Get Switzerland base maps data — bfs_get_base_maps
text: functions helps get base maps data ThemaKart project sf object. geom names general structure files can found offical BFS documentation, see https://www.bfs.admin.ch/asset/en/24025645. using data, please read condition use copyright mentions.

title: Get Switzerland base maps data — bfs_get_base_maps
code: bfs_get_base_maps(   geom = NULL,   category = "gf",   type = "Poly",   date = NULL,   most_recent = TRUE,   format = "shp",   asset_number = "24025646" )

title: Get Switzerland base maps data — bfs_get_base_maps
text: geom Geometry "suis", "kant", "bezk", "polg", "voge", etc. category Category 'total_area' ("gf" "Gesamtflaeche") 'vegetation_area' ("vf" "Vegetationsflaeche"). type type data, .e. "Poly" "Pnts". date Date (yyyymmdd) reference / validity. specified, `most_recent` argument used. most_recent Get recent sorting files decreasing order, FALSE read first file available. format Format file, default SHP format. asset_number Asset number base maps zip file.

title: Get Switzerland base maps data — bfs_get_base_maps
text: sf object geometries. Returns NULL connection.

title: Get Switzerland base maps data — bfs_get_base_maps
text: want get ThemaKart data previous years, can change `asset_number` related zip file. example, map set year 2020, asset number "11927607". function caching base map data using `tools::R_user_dir(package = "BFS")`.

what: Get the BFS data or table catalog — bfs_get_catalog
title: Get the BFS data or table catalog — bfs_get_catalog
text: function scraps given RSS Feed Swiss Federal Statistical Office.

title: Get the BFS data or table catalog — bfs_get_catalog
code: bfs_get_catalog(language = "de", type = "data")

title: Get the BFS data or table catalog — bfs_get_catalog
text: language character language BFS catalog. type character BFS catalog

title: Get the BFS data or table catalog — bfs_get_catalog
text: data frame. Returns NULL connection.

what: Get the BFS data catalog — bfs_get_catalog_data
title: Get the BFS data catalog — bfs_get_catalog_data
text: Get list data available official DAM-API Swiss Federal Statistical Office asset catalog.

title: Get the BFS data catalog — bfs_get_catalog_data
code: bfs_get_catalog_data(   language = "de",   title = NULL,   extended_search = NULL,   spatial_division = NULL,   prodima = NULL,   inquiry = NULL,   institution = NULL,   publishing_year_start = NULL,   publishing_year_end = NULL,   order_nr = NULL,   limit = 1000,   article_model = 900033,   article_model_group = 900029 )

title: Get the BFS data catalog — bfs_get_catalog_data
text: language character language BFS catalog, .e. "de", "fr", "" "en". title character String search (sub/super)title extended_search character String extended search (sub/super)title, orderNr, summary, shortSummary, shortTextGNP spatial_division BFS datasets spatial division, choose "Switzerland", "Cantons", "Districts", "Communes", "spatial divisions" "International" prodima numeric Get specific BFS themes using one multiple prodima numbers inquiry character BFS datasets inquiry institution character BFS datasets institution publishing_year_start character BFS datasets publishing year start publishing_year_end character BFS datasets publishing year end order_nr character Filter BFS Number (FSO number) limit integer limit query results (1000 default) article_model integer articleModel parameter query article_model_group integer articleModel parameter query

title: Get the BFS data catalog — bfs_get_catalog_data
text: data frame. Returns NULL connection. tbl_df (type data frame; see tibble dplyr packages). Returns NULL connection.

title: Get the BFS data catalog — bfs_get_catalog_data
code: # \donttest{ bfs_get_catalog_data(language = "en", title = "students", prodima = c(900212)) #> # A tibble: 4 × 9 #>   title                   language number_asset publication_date order_nr url_px #>   <chr>                   <chr>    <chr>        <date>           <chr>    <chr>  #> 1 University of applied … en       31306033     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… #> 2 University of applied … en       31306029     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… #> 3 University students by… en       31305852     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… #> 4 University students by… en       31305854     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… #> # ℹ 3 more variables: language_available <list>, url_structure_json <chr>, #> #   damId <int> # }

what: Get the geodata catalog of the Swiss Confederation — bfs_get_catalog_geodata
title: Get the geodata catalog of the Swiss Confederation — bfs_get_catalog_geodata
text: Display geo-information catalog Swiss Confederation (https://data.geo.admin.ch/), including geographic datasets provided Swiss Federal Statistical Office. Note geodata catalog hosted Swiss Federal Statistical Office.

title: Get the geodata catalog of the Swiss Confederation — bfs_get_catalog_geodata
code: bfs_get_catalog_geodata(include_metadata = TRUE)

title: Get the geodata catalog of the Swiss Confederation — bfs_get_catalog_geodata
text: include_metadata boolean TRUE loop geodata add metadata.

title: Get the geodata catalog of the Swiss Confederation — bfs_get_catalog_geodata
text: tbl_df (type data frame; see tibble dplyr packages). Returns NULL connection.

title: Get the geodata catalog of the Swiss Confederation — bfs_get_catalog_geodata
text: now Stac API datasets accessible.

code: bfs_get_catalog_tables(   language = "de",   title = NULL,   extended_search = NULL,   spatial_division = NULL,   prodima = NULL,   inquiry = NULL,   institution = NULL,   publishing_year_start = NULL,   publishing_year_end = NULL,   order_nr = NULL,   limit = 1000,   article_model = 900030,   article_model_group = 900029 )

title: Get the BFS tables catalog — bfs_get_catalog_tables
text: language character language BFS catalog, .e. "de", "fr", "" "en". title character String search (sub/super)title extended_search character String extended search (sub/super)title, orderNr, summary, shortSummary, shortTextGNP spatial_division BFS datasets spatial division, choose "Switzerland", "Cantons", "Districts", "Communes", "spatial divisions" "International" prodima numeric Get specific BFS themes using one multiple prodima numbers inquiry character BFS datasets inquiry institution character BFS datasets institution publishing_year_start character BFS datasets publishing year start publishing_year_end character BFS datasets publishing year end order_nr character Filter BFS Number (FSO number) limit integer limit query results (1000 default) article_model integer articleModel parameter query article_model_group integer articleModel parameter query

title: Get the BFS tables catalog — bfs_get_catalog_tables
text: data frame. Returns NULL connection. tbl_df (type data frame; see tibble dplyr packages). Returns NULL connection.

title: Get the BFS tables catalog — bfs_get_catalog_tables
code: # \donttest{ bfs_get_catalog_data(language = "en", title = "students", prodima = c(900212)) #> # A tibble: 4 × 9 #>   title                   language number_asset publication_date order_nr url_px #>   <chr>                   <chr>    <chr>        <date>           <chr>    <chr>  #> 1 University of applied … en       31306033     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… #> 2 University of applied … en       31306029     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… #> 3 University students by… en       31305852     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… #> 4 University students by… en       31305854     2024-03-28       px-x-15… https… #> # ℹ 3 more variables: language_available <list>, url_structure_json <chr>, #> #   damId <int> # }

what: Get BFS data in a given language — bfs_get_data
title: Get BFS data in a given language — bfs_get_data
text: Get dataset using PXWEB API v1. choose either BFS number (FSO number) BFS offical url given dataset. can query particulary variables using `query` argument.

title: Get BFS data in a given language — bfs_get_data
code: bfs_get_data(   number_bfs,   language = "de",   query = NULL,   column_name_type = "text",   variable_value_type = "text",   clean_names = FALSE,   delay = NULL )

title: Get BFS data in a given language — bfs_get_data
text: number_bfs BFS number (FSO number) dataset. language Language dataset translated exists, .e. "de", "fr", "" "en". query list named values, json query file json query string using pxweb::pxweb_query(). column_name_type Column name type "text" "code". variable_value_type Variable value type "text" "code". clean_names Clean column names using janitor::clean_names(). delay Integer Number seconds wait query using Sys.sleep().

title: Get BFS data in a given language — bfs_get_data
text: tbl_df (type data frame; see tibble dplyr packages). Returns NULL connection.

title: Get the comments/footnotes of a BFS dataset in a given language — bfs_get_data_comments
text: number_bfs BFS number dataset. language Language dataset translated exists, .e. "de", "fr", "" "en". query list named values, json query file json query string using pxweb::pxweb_query(). clean_names Clean column names using janitor::clean_names() delay Integer Number seconds wait query using Sys.sleep().

title: Get the comments/footnotes of a BFS dataset in a given language — bfs_get_data_comments
text: tbl_df (type data frame; see tibble dplyr packages). Returns NULL connection.

title: Pipe operator — %>%

what: Swiss official commune register BZN — register_bzn
title: Swiss official commune register BZN — register_bzn
text: official commune register structured according cantons districts comparable administrative entities. Various federal, cantonal communal governments private businesses use register identifying referring communes.

code: register_bzn

text: <https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/fr/home/bases-statistiques/repertoire-officiel-communes-suisse.html>

title: Swiss official commune register BZN — register_bzn
text: Federal Statistical Office assigns number commune creates, administers publishes Swiss official commune register.

title: Swiss official commune register KT — register_kt
text: official commune register structured according cantons districts comparable administrative entities. Various federal, cantonal communal governments private businesses use register identifying referring communes.

title: BFS 0.5.10
text: CRAN release: 2024-09-27 fix bug metadata extraction bfs_get_catalog(), bfs_get_catalog_data() bfs_get_catalog_tables()

title: BFS 0.5.9
text: CRAN release: 2024-09-26 fix bfs_get_catalog(), bfs_get_catalog_data() bfs_get_catalog_tables()

title: BFS 0.5.8
text: CRAN release: 2024-02-23 functions return NULL internet connection. Tests skipped internet connection.

title: BFS 0.5.6
text: CRAN release: 2024-01-08 using Sys.sleep() 10 seconds avoid reaching API limits “delay” arg allows loop large datasets, example see #7 “bfs_url” argument unstable slow. See README recommended workflow using bfs_get_catalog_data() bfs_get_asset_metadata() add deprecation warning bfs_get_catalog() add tests add test coverage

title: BFS 0.5.5
text: CRAN release: 2023-09-20 fix encoding bug bfs_get_base_maps() #12 add fs R package dependency add unit tests remove unnecessary messages calling bfs_get_catalog_*() use tools instead rappdirs improve docs related query dimensions

title: BFS 0.5.4
text: CRAN release: 2023-09-13 using magrittr pipe allow older R versions, fix #11

title: BFS 0.5.3
text: CRAN release: 2023-08-18 add bfs_get_base_maps(). add data Swiss official commune register. update README.

title: BFS 0.5.2
text: CRAN release: 2023-08-11 BREAKING CHANGE: bfs_get_catalog_data() bfs_get_catalog_tables() return now dataframe “number_asset” instead “guid” variables. add bfs_download_asset() add bfs_get_asset_metadata() “number_bfs” first argument bfs_get_metadata() improve docs

title: BFS 0.5.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-06-08 BREAKING CHANGE: fix BFS version 0.5 broke bfs_get_data(). Fix now #10 removing “” default argument query.

title: BFS 0.5
text: CRAN release: 2023-06-08 fix bug #10 add bfs_get_catalog_geodata() add bfs_download_geodata() improve docs

title: BFS 0.4.8
text: CRAN release: 2023-05-31 BREAKING CHANGE: reorder arguments functions consistency bfs_get_catalog_tables() now gets full catalog, fixing #5 bfs_get_catalog_tables() new functions filter datasets directly use “httr2” instead “jsonlite” better console messages improve README, docs sticker.

title: BFS 0.4.7
text: CRAN release: 2023-05-19 add new function bfs_get_metadata() fix bug duplicated column names as_tibble(. .name_repair = "minimal")

title: BFS 0.4.5
text: CRAN release: 2023-02-27 Fix bug bfs_get_data_comments() #8. improve README adding info dependencies.

title: BFS 0.4.4
text: CRAN release: 2022-12-14 Fix bug using query argument bfs_get_data() remove depreciated function bfs_get_metadata() bfs_get_dataset()

title: BFS 0.4.3
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-07 Fixed bfs_get_catalog_data() bfs_get_catalog_tables() bug #6. tidyRSS GitHub dependency version 2.0.5. Add tests bfs_get_catalog_* functions.

title: BFS 0.4.2
text: Fixed bfs_get_catalog_data() bfs_get_catalog_tables() bug #6. tidyRSS dependency version 2.0.4. Improved README.

title: BFS 0.4.1
text: CRAN release: 2021-10-09 BREAKING CHANGE: clean_names bfs_get_data() now FALSE default. bfs_get_data() uses BFS API v1. bfs_get_metadata() deprecated. Please use bfs_get_catalog_data(). add bfs_get_catalog_tables(). add bfs_get_catalog(). pxweb jsonlite dependency added. dplyr dependency removed.

title: BFS 0.3.1
text: CRAN release: 2021-05-10 fix issue #3 pull request #1

title: BFS 0.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-03-23 fix critical bug bfs_get_dataset() add new function bfs_get_catalog()

title: BFS 0.2.6
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added bfs_get_catalog() function, scraps RSS feed
